name: @DeepGuide-Ai/dg
description: Self-testing CLI documentation tool that generates interactive terminal demos
author: DeepGuide.ai

scripts.build:exe:all: bun run build:exe:darwin-arm64 && bun run build:exe:darwin-x64 && bun run build:exe:linux-x64
scripts.build:exe:darwin-arm64: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-arm64 src/index.ts --outfile dist/dg-darwin-arm64 --define DG_VERSION=\"$npm_package_version\"
scripts.build:exe:darwin-x64: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64 src/index.ts --outfile dist/dg-darwin-x64 --define DG_VERSION=\"$npm_package_version\"
scripts.build:exe:linux-x64: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 src/index.ts --outfile dist/dg-linux-x64 --define DG_VERSION=\"$npm_package_version\"
scripts.release: bun run build && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: bun run build && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: bun run build && npm version major && git push --follow-tags
